items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and elegant!
items.body: The media could not be loaded. Excellent quality, the color is exactly as described, it fits me perfectly and is very comfortable. The fabric is shiny, not see-through, because it's thick, yet not heavy. I love it! You'll be very happy if you buy it because you'll look incredibly elegant! Read more
items.author: Nilda Coello

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a Beautiful Dress!
items.body: I couldn't be more happier with this dress! So I bought this dress to do a 40th birthday photo shoot here at home. I wanted to find a nice quality dress and I am so glad that I found it right here! I was a little worried about the sizing but it fit perfectly and it was so beautiful! It made me feel so fancy! I think I want another one in red! I like how the slit is adjustable to your liking. The dress itself is so beautiful and flattering and I am already thinking of other events to wear it to. I am 5'4" tall and currently 133 lbs. and purchased a size small. I love it! Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Trixia Lassiter

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dress is true to colour
items.body: So pretty this dress. Ordered it for my very slim daughter. Ordered the smallest size. It fit well. Was so gorgeous for prom. Length was good because she is tall and made her look shapely even though she is very slim. It was not see through but great material. Very comfortable dress. Read more
items.author: Charmaine

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great purchase!
items.body: Was pleasantly surprised by this purchase. Quality of it was great and it look really nice on me. Saw a lot of reviews that said they could have sized down but it is definitely true to size. I’m a curvy small and it fit like a glove. If I’d gotten a XS it would have fit but not comfortably. Hope this helps if you are going back and forth between what sizes to get. Read more
items.author: LD

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress for a guest, not quite enough if you're in the wedding court.
items.body: I was designated to wear hot pink for a beach destination wedding as part of the wedding party. I thought this was a great option as it had flair and the exact pop of color I was looking for. It had great reviews, mentioning the fit was comfortable, and packed well in a suitcase , but could be steamed easily. Based off of the size chart, (I'm 5'8, 150lbs 28" waist & 34D bustline) I bought a Medium, and while it fit it was not the fit I was hoping for. It felt loose in the underarms as well as as the stomach ruching area. The length also did not work as I was hoping it would graze the floor with my 2" heels but it did not. I did love that it had a zipper in the slit and that the thin strap could easily be tucked in or cut if you preferred to wear the dress that way. I would have exchanged for a sz small had the length worked out, but ultimately I returned. I would say this is a great dress if you're 5'6" and under. Read more
items.author: Nanzeeee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Say yes to the dress!!
items.body: Wonderful dress!! The material is a great quality and made wearing the dress very comfortable. The tasteful shimmer was beau and the item appeared as advertised. There is a lot of stretch, making dancing, sitting, and standing a breeze. The dress is very well made and is not at all see through. The ruffle stands on its own which gives the dress an extra bit of pizazz. This simple, yet elegant dress is a must have!! Oh, I almost forgot the zippered slit … you can be as sexy or modest as you’d like … simply adjust the slit to the desired height and voila!! For reference, I am 5’4 and approx 190 lbs. I ordered an XL, but could probably have gotten away with a Large. It still looked amazing and I would definitely order this again. Read more
items.author: Charlisa G. Randol

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect!!!
items.body: The dress was nicer than expected, the material is stretchy, sparkly, the length was perfect, I usually need to get the length adjusted, just loved the way it fits! Read more
items.author: Yoly

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just buy it. Perfect for mid size and curvy ladies
items.body: I loved this dress! First - size up. I am 5’8” 190lbs and typically wear a 14 pants, 16 dress with a 38DDD bust. I went up two sizes (bought a 3xl) because I have a little tummy and I didn’t want it to be super tight and accentuate it. I tried the 2xl and it was also beautiful but was more fitted in the mid section. I wore it with flats but I could have definitely wore heels. I wore a regular strapless bra but you could also do a one strap bra. The decorative shoulder has a little bit of like a grippy material so it didn’t slide down once- not dancing not picking up my nephew not once. The other strap is adjustable. I also loved the adjustable slit. Now the dress. Fabric is super comfortable and stretchy. I could dance all night, drop it low you name it. It was incredibly hot out and I stayed comfortable. Fabric was light enough. The red was an actual red, bright and happy. I received so many compliments all day long. Read more
items.author: Patty

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Evening Formal One Shoulder Ruched Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Evening Formal One Shoulder Ruched Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Evening Formal One Shoulder Ruched Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sparkly Royal Blue, Sparkly Royal Blue and Black, Sparkly Blush Pink, Haze Blue Velvet, Sparkly Dark Red, Off-white Lace, Sparkly Dark Magenta, Off-white Textured, Sparkly Light Blue, Sparkly Hot Pink and Black, Sparkly Hot Pink, Black Velvet, Sparkly Blue-b, Light Green With Golden Stitching. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
